markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ooze Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2189) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Oozemorph](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=84)

**Prerequisites**
[Oozemorph Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2185); at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype

</column>

---

You can connect with [oozes](/Traits.aspx?ID=122) (and other amorphous [aberrations](/Traits.aspx?ID=1), at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on oozes and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of them. In most instances, oozes will give you time to make your case.
name: Ooze Empathy
prerequisite: Oozemorph Dedication; at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype
prerequisite_markdown: [Oozemorph Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2185); at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype
